name: My 3D Random Dungeon Generator
description:
This is a randomly generated maze creator to be used in RPG style video games.
The current version is 0.32 and is in constant development.

Features it has:

* Labyrinths are created with closed rooms and passages
* secret passages
* doors with or without keys
* selectable room style
*  Dungeons are created in a 2D array

Made with Unity 2020

Added button beam up
